description:
Business Type:
Cosmetic & Skincare Brand

Description:
A beauty brand offering natural skincare and cosmetic products made with
safe ingredients and dermatologically tested formulas.

Target Audience:
Women and men, beauty-conscious customers

Tone:
Elegant, clean, premium

Design Notes:
- Soft pastel colors
- Product showcase section
- Customer reviews section

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: Introduce the brand's elegant and natural philosophy, showcase best-selling products, and build trust with social proof.

pages.name: shop
pages.purpose: Allow customers to browse and purchase the full range of skincare and cosmetic products.

pages.name: about_us
pages.purpose: Share the brand's story, commitment to safe and natural ingredients, and build a deeper connection with the customer.

pages.name: contact
pages.purpose: Provide customers with an easy way to get in touch for support, inquiries, or collaborations.

styling.font_family: elegant serif for headings, clean sans-serif for body
